DOC.brief_title: Primary Paclitaxel Plus Gemcitabine Patients With Stage II III Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Patients treat follow : PG x 4®operation®AC x 4®radiation ± tamoxifen/AI ( postmenopausal ) Intravenous infusion Paclitaxel 80 mg/m2 , 60 min , D1 D8 Followed intravenous infusion Gemcitabine 1200 mg/m2 , 30 min , D1 D8 The cycle repeat every 3 week 4 time . Premedication include antiemetic , dexamethasone , famotidine , pheniramine routinely give . After operation , standard adjuvant chemotherapy ( doxorubicin 60 mg/m2 , cyclophosphamide 600 mg/m2 , every 3 week x 4 cycle ) give .
